mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_old(board_num, old_name, city, old_price) VALUES(#{board_num}, #{old_name}, #{city}, #{old_price})
mapper.select: SELECT A.board_num, A.title, A.user_id, A.write_date, B.city, C.profile_image, C.user_nickname, D.file1 FROM board A, board_old B, user C, board_common_image D WHERE A.board_num=B.board_num AND A.user_id=C.user_id AND A.board_num=D.board_num AND A.type_num=3 ORDER BY A.board_num DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}

SELECT A.board_num, A.title, A.hit, A.write_date, A.content, A.user_id, B.file1, B.file2, B.file3, B.file4, B.file5, C.old_name, C.old_price, C.city, D.user_nickname, D.report_hit, D.profile_image, D.exp, E.gender_name, F.state_num, G.state_name, H.frame_img FROM board A, board_common_image B, board_old C, user D, gender E, trade_detail F, trade_state G, user_grade H WHERE A.board_num=B.board_num AND A.board_num=C.board_num AND A.user_id=D.user_id AND A.gender_type=E.gender_type AND A.board_num=F.board_num AND F.state_num=G.state_num AND A.board_num=${param1} AND H.exp_min <= D.exp AND D.exp <= H.exp_max
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, gender_type=#{gender_type} WHERE board_num=#{board_num}
UPDATE board_old SET old_name=#{old_name}, city=#{city}, old_price=#{old_price} WHERE board_num=#{board_num}
UPDATE trade_detail SET state_num=#{state_num} WHERE board_num=#{board_num}
